description: Tranmere come from behind to beat Bromley at Prenton Park and give themselves a lifeline in their battle to avoid relegation from League Two.
title: Tranmere Rovers 2-1 Bromley
maintext:
Tranmere Rovers have lost both of their last two league games against sides from London, their longest run against sides from the capital in the top four tiers since losing five in a row from February 2013 to April 2014.
After losing the reverse fixture against Tranmere Rovers 2-1 in October, Bromley will be looking to avoid losing both matches to the same opposition for the fourth time this campaign in League Two â€“ after doing so against Bradford City, Crewe Alexandra, and Grimsby Town.
Tranmere are winless in their last 12 league games (D5 L7), last having a longer run in the Football League between September and November 2014 (13).
